short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the plugin to contribute behavior materials to the ABCD Knowledge Bank

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ABCD Bookmarking Tool is a browser extension that will enable behavioral and topic experts to seamlessly contribute knowledge materials and insights to the ABCD Knowledge Repository (abcd.guide). This tool enables collaboration with experts across a range of topics and geographies, as well as facilitates the scaling up of data collection efforts by crowd-sourcing knowledge materials on behavioral insights.

Users are able to submit material in the form of:
- Research papers
- Working papers
- Organisation reports
- Media articles and blogs
- News articles
- Transcriptions

Adding items to the ABCD Knowledge Repository is made easy through the extension where users can submit webpages, text excerpts, and PDFs through a few clicks. Items are reviewed by the ABCD team before they are incorporated into the repository. Beyond data collection, the feature serves as an opportunity to collaborate with researchers, experts, and organisations in an effort to further behavior change for social impact.
